name: Retro-Adventure Collection
description: This ZIP file contains several short adventure games  I wrote to test Lantern (my development) system.   The file provides DOS files, Spectrum 48K tape files, and .DSK and .PO files for Apple 2.  To run the Apple 2 games, type cat to see the files on the disk and find the .bin file.  You can run this file using the brun command (Example:  brun  game.bin)
